Package mulan.regressor.transformation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EnsembleOfRegressorChains
    This class implements the Ensemble of Regressor Chains (ERC) method.
    For more information, see:
    E.
    MultiTargetStacking
    This class implements the Multi-Target Stacking (MTS) method.
    RandomLinearCombinations
    Implementation of the multi-target regression method presented in Grigorios Tsoumakas, Eleftherios Spyromitros-Xioufis, Aikaterini Vrekou, Ioannis Vlahavas.
    RegressorChain
    This class implements the Regressor Chain (RC) method.
    RegressorChainSimple
    This class implements the Regressor Chain (RC) method.

    For more information, see:
    E.
    SingleTargetRegressor
    This class implements the baseline Single-Target (ST) method for multi-target regression that learns a separate regression model for each target.

    For more information, see:
    E.
    TransformationBasedMultiTargetRegressor
    Base class for multi-target regressors that use a single-target transformation to handle multi-target data.

    For more information, see:
    E.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EnsembleOfRegressorChains.SamplingMethod
    Three types of sampling.
    MultiTargetStacking.metaType
    The 4 alternative methods to obtain the values of the meta features.
    RegressorChain.metaType
    The 4 alternative methods to obtain the values of the meta features.
